info.name: Dark Neon Slack without glow
info.description:
This is a version of the Neon slack theme from: https://userstyles.org/styles/124658/neon-slack

However, this version none of the text glows

This is a dark theme for slack
info.additionalInfo:
This is a slight modification of the glowing neon slack theme here
https://userstyles.org/styles/124658/neon-slack


source code also available at https://github.com/Matthew-Smith/neon-slack
